result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clever D Escobar

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The charge is dismissed and read into 15CM1016.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Schleis requests an adjournment to allow time for additional negotiations with the State.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Schleiss requests matter be set for resolution.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Adam J. Schleis in court.   Defendant Clever D Escobar did not appear.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Attorney appears by authorization. Defense has discovery and an offer. Defense requests another date in 30 days to meet with his client and discuss this matter. Defense to advise on the next date how they will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation and is to return by 9:30 today. Case recalled with same appearances.   Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed. Court will give another date.  Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation or seek other counsel. Court will give another date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
